list_definition.definition: to seek advice or information from

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He consulted with me about what we should do next.

list_definition.definition: (of a doctor etc) to give professional advice

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He consults on Mondays and Fridays.
